site.title: Hanare Cafe in Toshijima, Toba, Japan
site.description: Our cafe/bakery is located in Toshijima, a beautiful sightseeing spot just a 20-minutes ferry ride from Toba. We bake delicious unique and classic pastries using fresh, local ingredients.
site.author: Masatoshi Nishiguchi

pastries.title: Pastries
pastries.description: Our delicious pastries, which use fresh local and regional ingredients, consist of both classic and unique assortments and offer something delightful for everyone.

cakes.title: Cakes
cakes.description: How about a custom-made cake or fruit tart for a celebration?

amenities.title: Amenities
amenities.description: We offer other food options, such as ice cream, along with a variety of beverage options, including coffee and tea. Hanare comfortably seats eight people; but, with the beautiful weather throughout the year, you’ll find it equally pleasant to eat outside and enjoy the serenity and beauty of the island.

food-truck.title: Food Truck
food-truck.description: Our food truck occasionally travels throughout the island providing extended access to our mouth-watering pastries. We also ship our baked goods to other islands in the region (e.g., Sakashima, Sugashima, Kamijima) by use of a municipal liner.

special-orders.title: Special Orders
special-orders.description: By appointment, we can accept special orders for bento lunch boxes, big fruits tarts, sushi, among other things. Contact us today to learn what other custom-made delights we can offer.

meet-the-owner.title: Meet the Owner
meet-the-owner.description: Our co-owners are Atsushi who is an experienced shef and Eri who is native to Toshijima

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: We couldn't find what you were looking for.

directions.message: We are located near a fish market in Momotori region of the remote island Toshijima. Please take a passenger ship from Toba Marine Terminal.
directions.by-kintetsu-train-title: For those coming by Kintetsu train
directions.by-kintetsu-train-description: Please get off at Toba Station and take Exit #2. The Toba Marine Terminal is about a 10-minute walk from there.
directions.by-jr-train-title: For those coming by JR train
directions.by-jr-train-description: Please get off at Toba Station and take Exit #2. The Toba Marine Terminal is about a 10-minute walk from there.
directions.by-car-description: The closest parking lot to the Toba Marine Terminal is Satahama parking lot.

mekabu-loaf.title: Mekabu Loaf
mekabu-loaf.description: Nutritious mekabu powder is blended in the dough, which gives the loaf unique texture and flavor.

contact-us.message: Since we are a small bakery run by a couple, we may not be able to catch up in case of increased demand... For customers from outside the island, please check out our Facebook page or contact us for our status. Thank you for understanding.
contact-us.no-english: We do not speak English. That would be great if you can find a Japanese speaker before calling us.

business-hours.title: Busines Hours
business-hours.description: 9:00 - 18:00 * If all pastries sell out before close of business, store may close early.

atsushi.name: Atsushi Tokumoto
atsushi.description: Atsushi is from Kuwana, Mie. He studied at a cooking and confectionery school and has 17 years of experience cooking Japanese cuisine.

eri.name: Eri Tokumoto
eri.description: Eri is from Toshijima, where her family runs wakeme farming and oyster farming. She co-manages the cafe and provides warm smiles and greetings to customers.
